title: New: Frank Ocean – Pyramids
content:
Of all the Odd Future crew, it’s rapidly becoming apparent who is the most talented.

Aside from working with Beyonce, Kanye and Jay-Z, Frank Ocean has also found time to finish off his own debut LP, Channel Orange, scheduled for release 16 July, and in typical Ocean style, he’s dropped a ten minute track in celebration. Pyramids steps it up a notch, developing the slick R&B sound pioneered by the likes of The-Dream and The Weeknd, with more than a whiff of Marvin Gaye thrown into the mix.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
